official-title.#text: To direct the Administrator of General Services to redevelop the Department of Energy Forrestal Complex in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Energy Forrestal Complex Redevelopment Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Department of Energy Forrestal Complex Redevelopment

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall take action, in accordance with the authority available to the
under Federal law, to redevelop the Department of Energy Forrestal Complex in a manner that is consistent with the SW Ecodistrict Plan.

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to carry out the redevelopment of the Department of Energy Forrestal Complex under

text.#text: Any agreement entered into by the
include such terms and conditions as the Administrator considers necessary and appropriate to protect the interests of the United States; and
facilitate the redevelopment of Maryland Avenue, Southwest, in the District of Columbia in a manner that is consistent with—
the SW Ecodistrict Plan; and
the Maryland Avenue Southwest Plan, including the reconstruction of Maryland Avenue, Southwest, as a multimodal corridor.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , and otherwise in accordance with existing authorities available to the Administrator, replacement space for Federal agency tenants in the Department of Energy Forrestal Complex whose relocation is made necessary by the redevelopment of such Complex under

text.#text: Before entering into any agreement related to the redevelopment of the Department of Energy Forrestal Complex, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall include a summary of a cost-benefit analysis of the proposed agreement and a description of the material provisions of the proposed agreement.

the report with respect to the proposed agreement.
